data.name: OrderFlankDescription
data.value: - Increased move speed. - Deactivate all weapons.

data.name: OrderFocusFireDescription
data.value: - Increased fire rate. - Decreased move speed.

data.name: OrderRepairDescription
data.value: - Emergency repairs. - Deactivate weapons. - Deactivate thrusters.

data.name: SysDeviceChoose
data.value:
YOU HAVE NOT SELECTED A STORAGE DEVICE. NO PROGRESS OR CHANGES TO GAME SETTINGS WILL BE SAVED.
DO YOU WANT TO SELECT A STORAGE DEVICE NOW?

data.name: MenuProfileError
data.value: NO GAMER PROFILE CHOSEN You did not choose a gamer profile. Singleplayer progress saving will not be available.

data.name: MenuProfileNotSignedin
data.value:
YOU ARE NOT SIGNED IN. TO SAVE PROGRESS, YOU MUST BE SIGNED IN.
SIGN IN NOW?

data.name: MenuProfileSigninChange
data.value: A SIGN-IN CHANGE HAS OCCURRED. YOU ARE NOW BEING RETURNED TO THE TITLE SCREEN.

data.value: EXPLORE DIFFERENT PLANETS TO FIND UPGRADES AND ARTIFACTS.

data.name: MenuBuyProfileError
data.value:
YOU NEED TO SIGN IN TO XBOX LIVE TO UNLOCK THIS GAME.
SIGN IN NOW?

data.value: NO HIGH SCORES FOUND. START A NEW ADVENTURE!

data.value: Player 2: Connect XBOX360 controller and press

data.name: MenuSkirmishTrialSelection
data.value:
THE {0} IS NOT AVAILABLE IN THE TRIAL VERSION OF FLOTILLA.
DO YOU WANT TO UNLOCK THE FULL GAME?

data.name: MenuSkirmishTrialShipError
data.value:
YOU ARE USING SHIPS NOT AVAILABLE IN THE TRIAL VERSION.
NON-TRIAL SHIPS HAVE BEEN REMOVED FROM YOUR FLEETS.

data.name: MenuLogEmpty
data.value: NO LOG ENTRIES. GO EXPLORE THE GALAXY!

data.name: TutorialPCMouseCam
data.value: PRESS AND HOLD TO TURN CAMERA

data.name: TutorialArmorTip
data.value: TIP: SHIP ARMOR IS WEAK IN THE REAR AND BOTTOM

data.name: MenuPatchAvailable
TutorialOrdersIntro
data.value: NOW, LET'S BLOW UP THAT ENEMY.

data.name: TutorialPlanarMove
data.value:
ORDER YOUR SHIP'S DESTINATION.
TIPS: - SHIP ARMOR IS WEAK IN THE REAR AND BOTTOM - STAY OUT OF ENEMY FIRING ARCS - FLANK AROUND THE ENEMY!

data.name: TutorialOpenCommandMenu
data.value: GOOD! NOW, OPEN THE COMMAND MENU.

data.name: TutorialEndTurn
data.value:
SELECT "END TURN" AFTER ISSUING ORDERS TO ALL YOUR SHIPS.
DURING THIS PHASE, YOU WILL WATCH THE FLEETS FOLLOW THEIR BATTLE ORDERS.

data.name: MenuBugReportThanks
data.value:
BUG REPORT HAS BEEN SENT.
LOVE, BLENDO GAMES

data.name: MenuBugReportEmptyDescription
data.value: PLEASE FILL IN THE DESCRIPTION BOX.

data.name: MenuDemoPlanetLocked
data.value:
PLANET {0} IS LOCKED IN THE TRIAL VERSION OF FLOTILLA.
DO YOU WANT TO UNLOCK THE FULL GAME?

data.name: MenuHighScoresTrial
data.value: UNLOCK THE FULL GAME TO SEE HIGH SCORE TABLE!

data.name: TutorialNextShip
data.value:
GREAT! YOU'VE JUST COMPLETED GIVING ATTACK ORDERS TO ONE OF YOUR SHIPS.
NOW, GIVE ORDERS TO YOUR OTHER SHIP.

data.name: MenuSkirmishNoShips
data.value:
{0}'S FLEET IS EMPTY!
ENSURE ALL PLAYERS HAVE SHIPS IN THEIR FLEET.

data.name: MenuSellBuyToday
data.value: BUY TODAY TO UNLOCK UNLIMITED GAMEPLAY!

data.name: MenuSellExplore
data.value: Explore new planets in Adventure Mode!

data.name: MenuSellFight
data.value: Face off against a friend or computer in Skirmish Mode!

data.name: MenuSellScores
data.value: Save your scores in the Hall of Fame!

data.name: MenuSellUpgrades
data.value: Upgrade your ships with exotic artifacts!

data.name: MenuSkirmishTrialSelectionNoSignin
data.value: THE {0} IS NOT AVAILABLE IN THE TRIAL VERSION OF FLOTILLA.

data.name: TutorialExplorePC
data.value:
GREAT JOB!
NOW IT'S TIME TO START YOUR ADVENTURE. CLICK ON A PLANET AND EXPLORE!

data.name: TutorialExploreXBOX
data.value:
GREAT JOB!
NOW IT'S TIME TO EXPLORE THE UNIVERSE. MOVE THE CURSOR OVER A PLANET AND PRESS [A].
GOOD LUCK!

data.name: TraderPlayerItem
data.value: ...NOW TRADE ME TWO OF YOUR ITEMS.

data.name: TradingNoCargo
data.value:
YOU DON'T HAVE ENOUGH CARGO TO TRADE WITH ME.
COME VISIT AGAIN AFTER YOU FIND MORE LOOT!

data.name: TradingTraderItem
data.value:
YOU LOOK LIKE SOMEONE WHO WANTS TO MAKE A DEAL.
WHAT ITEM INTERESTS YOU?

data.name: SysDeviceDisconnect
data.value:
A STORAGE DEVICE HAS BEEN DISCONNECTED OR CHANGED.
NO PROGRESS OR CHANGES TO GAME SETTINGS WILL BE SAVED.

data.name: MenuSkirmishPlayer2JoinPressPC
data.value: Player 2: Connect gamepad controller and press primary button

data.name: MenuSelfDestructDescription
data.value: WARNING! THIS WILL DESTROY YOUR ENTIRE FLEET. ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO END IN A BLAZE OF GLORY?

data.name: HelpArmorBottom
data.value: PROJECTILES ARE ABLE TO PENETRATE THIS ARMOR AND INFLICT MAJOR DAMAGE.

data.name: HelpArmorDesc
data.value: THERE ARE WEAK SPOTS IN EVERY SHIP'S ARMOR. EXPLOIT THEM! MANEUVER YOUR SHIPS TO GET A CLEAR SHOT AT VULNERABLE LOCATIONS.

data.name: HelpArmorTop
data.value: THIS ARMOR IS ABLE TO DEFLECT ALMOST ALL PROJECTILES.

data.name: HelpOrdersAttack
data.value: THE SHIP MOVES WHILE FIRING. THIS STANDARD MANEUVER IS EFFECTIVE IN MANY SITUATIONS.

data.name: HelpOrdersDesc
data.value: SHIPS HAVE THREE AVAILABLE ORDERS TO CHOOSE FROM.

data.name: HelpOrdersFlank
data.value: ENGINES RECEIVE A DRAMATIC SPEED BOOST, AT THE EXPENSE OF NOT BEING ABLE TO FIRE WEAPONS.

data.name: HelpOrdersFocus
data.value: INCREASES THE FIRING RATE OF THE WEAPON SYSTEMS, BUT SLOWS ENGINE SPEED TO A CRAWL.

data.name: HelpTurnsAction
data.value: IN THE ACTION PHASE, WATCH YOUR FLEET (AND THE ENEMY FLEET) CARRY OUT ITS GIVEN ORDERS.

data.name: HelpTurnsDescription
data.value: COMBAT IN FLOTILLA USES A SIMULTANEOUS TURN-BASED STYLE OF PLAY. THERE ARE TWO PHASES IN COMBAT: THE ORDERS PHASE AND THE ACTION PHASE.

data.name: HelpTurnsOrders
data.value: IN THE ORDERS PHASE, YOU GIVE ORDERS TO YOUR SHIPS.

data.name: MenuSkirmishMissingPlayer
data.value:
ONE OF THE SIDES IS EMPTY!
ADD ANOTHER PLAYER OR COMPUTER PLAYER.

data.name: MenuHighScoreOnlineEmpty
data.value: ONLINE HALL OF FAME IS EMPTY

data.name: MenuHighScoreSendError
data.value:
THERE WAS A PROBLEM ACCESSING THE ONLINE HIGH SCORE TABLE.
PLEASE CHECK YOUR INTERNET CONNECTION.

data.name: SmiteDescription
data.value: PRAY TO THE IMPLEMENTORS TO VAPORIZE AN ENEMY

data.name: SmiteDescriptionActive
data.value: END THE TURN TO WITNESS THE WRATH OF THE IMPLEMENTORS!

data.name: SmiteDescriptionRequirements
data.value: ATTACK ENEMIES TO ACCESS THIS CELESTIAL WEAPON

data.value: SORRY, HARDCORE MODE IS NOT AVAILABLE IN THE TRIAL VERSION.
